Package entrants.utils.graph

Class GhostDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • entrants.utils.graph.AgentDescription
      • entrants.utils.graph.GhostDescription
  • public class GhostDescription
extends AgentDescription
    This class serves to describe a ghost as he is perceived by another agent. We keep which ghost it is, its position & its edible time.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GhostDescription​(pacman.game.Constants.GHOST ghost, Node position)
      Initializes a ghost description for a given ghost in a given position.
      GhostDescription​(pacman.game.Constants.GHOST ghost, Node position, int edibleTime)
      Initializes a ghost description for a given given ghost, position & edible time.

      • getGhostDescription

        public static GhostDescription getGhostDescription​(java.lang.Iterable<GhostDescription> ghostDescriptions,
                                                   pacman.game.Constants.GHOST ghost)
        Retrieves a specified ghost's description among an iterable of ghost descriptions.
        Parameters:
        ghostDescriptions - The ghost descriptions where the search should be performed.
        ghost - The ghost whose description is desired.
        Returns:
        The description of the specified ghost if it exists. null otherwise.
